item.title: About
item.description:
I’m Dong Gao, the founder of SUPER QUANT, a specialist executive search firm focused on top-tier talent in quantitative finance.

While my work sits in recruiting, my primary interest has always been upstream of hiring itself — how alpha is actually produced, how organizations make decisions under constraints, and why certain roles become critical at specific moments.

I work closely with decision-makers at leading quant funds, typically recommending very few people, and only where I believe the fit is structurally sound over the long term.

item.title: Head of US Futures Trading(multi-millions USD package)– New York;
item.description: From a leading quant trading firm in Asia-Pacific, managing multiple billion USD AUM, delivering sustainable leading performance across futures and equities in the region. Now, they are breaking new ground — launching mid-to-high frequency US futures trading division in New York. This is a ground-zero opportunity to architect, build, and lead a brand-new U.S. futures strategy and team, with direct reporting to the CEO/Founder. Demonstrated expertise in architecting and implementing mid-to-high frequency trading strategies is essential.

item.title: Quant想涨薪，绕不开的三个问题
item.description:
从策略逻辑底层：所有优势，都是“不公平”的

我不是Quant，我也不懂这些艰深的策略细节和数学知识，但随着接触的研究员和基金经理越来越多，我就发现，如果你把整个量化投资世界拆开看，你会发现它的底层逻辑，就是通过不对称信息与不均衡能力的系统博弈。
